items.title: Mcap of 9 of 10 valued firms erodes Rs 4.74 trn; RIL, HDFC Bank hit hard
items.description: The valuation of Reliance Industries declined Rs 1,88,479.36 crore to Rs 18,76,718.24 crore

items.title: FPIs withdraw Rs  27,142 cr in 3 trading sessions on geopolitical tensions
items.description: The outflow came after FPI investment reached a nine-month high of Rs 57,724 crore in September

items.title: RBI interest rate decision, West Asia conflict to drive markets: Analysts
items.description: Moreover, quarterly earnings from IT bellwether TCS, domestic macroeconomic data and movement in global oil benchmark Brent crude would also guide trends in the market

items.title: Street signs: Large floats stay afloat, NSE sets data pack rules, more
items.description: Despite the market turmoil sparked by tensions in West Asia, experts believe that upcoming mega-share sales will remain unaffected

items.title: Rocky start for equities in H2FY25 puts focus on mutual fund flows
items.description: Charting course to calm: With record equity inflows of Rs 2.8 trillion in FY25, they provide the ballast that steadies the ship amid choppy FPI exits

items.title: LIC boosts stake in Pune-based Bank of Maharashtra from 4.05% to 7.10%
items.description: LIC acquired 3.376 per cent equity of the bank during the QIP process at an average cost of Rs 57.36
